backend/main.mo: Defines booking, service rate, and time-slot types with CRUD functions for bookings, service rates, availability, and estimate calculation.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented product features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides one-line summaries for key frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, and state modules.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with home and admin routes wrapped in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Displays bookings sorted by creation date with a CSV export option.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Admin form for viewing and updating POP, PVC, and wall molding service rates.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin UI to view and toggle time slot availability and save updates via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Booking form handling user input, validation, time‑slot filtering, and submission via createBooking.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Validates booking form fields including name, mobile, date, time slot, and area.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Floating WhatsApp contact button linking to configured number.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile‑only sticky CTA bar triggering the booking action.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Live estimate calculator computing cost based on service type, area, and dynamic rates.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying company info, contact details, services, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky header with brand, call button, and admin navigation link.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Contact information section showing phone, email, and service area details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Before‑and‑after gallery displaying generated project images.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Hero banner with background image, headline, and buttons for booking or calling.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Renders a 3-step “How It Works” marketing section using icons and animated Section wrapper.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Displays customer reviews in card format with star ratings inside a Section component.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable layout section with background variants and scroll-reveal animation logic.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Shows a grid of service cards with pricing and a Book Now action that preselects a service.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Lists key reasons to choose the service provider with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Defines static contact and GST config for Ceiling Pro.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines service metadata and provides a helper to resolve service rates with defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Fetches all bookings and provides a mutation to create new bookings via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and provides identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Implements an IntersectionObserver hook to reveal elements when scrolled into view.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: Fetches and updates service rate data via the backend actor with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: Retrieves and updates booking time-slot availability from the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with layout tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with editors for service rates, time slot availability, and a table of all bookings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage UI and auto-scrolls to the booking section when a service is preselected.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Defines a Zustand store for tracking and resetting a preselected booking service.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, image needs, and architectural notes for the Ceiling Pro website.
